course_title: Support for Math-192 Analytic Geometry And Calculus I

sections.instructor: Mircheva, Diana, Co-Requisite: MATH-192 or equivalent Note: This course is a co-requisite to MATH-192 and provides additional support for students who want to feel more confident in their math skills. Note: Section 2974, a support course for MATH-192 students is linked to MATH-192-2972. Students must enroll in both MATH-192-2972 and MATH-002-2974 in order to be eligible for this section. The combined classes meet on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday 11:10am-1:00pm. Class meets weekly as scheduled.

Sohi, Anna, Co-Requisite: MATH-192 or equivalent Note: This course is a co-requisite to MATH-192 and provides additional support for students who want to feel more confident in their math skills. Note: Section 2950, a support course for MATH-192 students is linked to MATH-192-2949. Students must enroll in both MATH-192-2949 and MATH-002-2950 in order to be eligible for this section. The combined classes meet on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday 9:00am-10:50am. Class meets weekly as scheduled.
